title.rendered: Enjoy the Perfect Lifestyle at the Perfect Price

content.rendered:
Enter into the essence of beauty with Gulshan Bellina. A perfect combination of stunningly designed homes and incredible amenities, Gulshan Bellina is pieced together to offer a delightful lifestyle. Set on the flourishing location of Greater Noida West, these majestic 19-floor towers – comprising of beautifully-designed 2 and 3 BHK homes.

Here are the amazing features of Gulshan Bellina:

Location Advantage –

Stay close to all your daily and leisurely needs. Strategically constructed in the thriving locality of Greater Noida West, traveling to prime locations will be a convenient experience. The following destinations are in proximity to Gulshan Bellina

o NH-24 highway

o Kalindi Kunj

o Upcoming Jewar Airport as approved by the government.

o Proposed Metro station

o F1 Track at Buddh International Circuit

o The Great India Place

o Amity Chowk

Amenities –

Enjoy a countless range of useful and opulent amenities at Gulshan Bellina

o Indoor games

o Internet connectivity

o AC unisex beauty salon

o Jogging track

o Basketball court (half court)

o AC gymnasium, yoga/aerobics

o Special Play-pan for kids

o Laundry Services

o Open Air Theatre

o Kids Lounge

o In- Compound OPD

o Swimming pool

o Wheelchair for Elderly and sick

Brand –

Gulshan religiously adheres to the philosophy of ‘no compromise’. Our focus on quality, precision and perfect planning make each Gulshan project a milestone of success. A countless number of satisfied customers and timely delivery of projects make Gulshan responsible, reliable. If you are looking for residential projects
in Noida, there are some amazing upcoming housing projects in Greater Noida. Gulshan Bellina by Gulshan stands out the most with its flawlessly designed 2 bhk flats in Greater Noida.
